summary: Social app with a strictly minimal home feed: public posts only, sorted by createdAt DESC, no ranking, no metrics, no explore, no suggested posts, no engagement sorting.
architectural_notes: Feed query: SELECT public posts ORDER BY createdAt DESC â€” no ranking, scoring, or engagement signals

existing_features.title: CommunityFeedPage must render the feed exactly as returned (public posts, createdAt DESC). Remove any client-side re-sorting, ranking, engagement-based filtering, explore sections, or suggested-posts sections. No metrics (like counts, reaction counts, view counts) should be displayed on feed post cards in this page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home feed shows public posts only, sorted by createdAt DESC, with no ranking, metrics, explore, suggested posts, or engagement sorting

The backend getPublicPosts (or equivalent feed query) must return only posts where visibility is public, sorted strictly by createdAt descending. No ranking score, engagement weight, or any secondary sort criteria may be applied.
